'''Menegilda Brandybuck, n√©e Goold''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Menegilda married [[Rorimac Brandybuck]], and with him produced two children, [[Saradoc Brandybuck|Saradoc]] and [[Merimac Brandybuck|Merimac]]. 

Unlike her husband and sons, she was not present at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Birthday Party]] in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name contains ''meneg'' "much" and ''hild'' "battle".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
